description: AI-powered image enhancement using advanced super-resolution technology to transform low-quality images into crystal-clear results.
this-module-enhances-image-clarity-using: This module enhances image clarity using AI-powered super resolution technology. It takes a blurry or low-resolution image URL and returns a high-quality enhanced version.
url-of-the-image-to-enhance: URL of the image to enhance
session-id-for-polling-the-enhancement-r: Session ID for polling the enhancement result
whether-the-request-was-submitted-succes: Whether the request was submitted successfully
query-the-status-and-result-of-an-image-: Query the status and result of an image enhancement conversion task from fal-aura-sr API with optional polling support
task-id-returned-from-the-conversion-req: Task ID returned from the conversion request
enable-automatic-polling-until-task-comp: Enable automatic polling until task completes (default: true)
interval-between-polling-attempts-in-sec: Interval between polling attempts in seconds (default: 5)
url-of-the-enhanced-image-available-when: URL of the enhanced image (available when status is completed)
complete-result-data-from-the-api: Complete result data from the API
boolean-indicating-if-the-task-is-comple: Boolean indicating if the task is completed
enhances-image-quality-and-clarity-from-: Enhances image quality and clarity from a local file using AI-powered super-resolution. This subflow uploads a local image file to cloud storage, submits it to the enhancement service, polls for completion, and downloads the enhanced result to a specified location. Perfect for batch processing or improving resolution of local image files with automatic file handling.
the-local-file-path-of-the-image-to-enha: The local file path of the image to enhance. The file will be uploaded to cloud storage and processed by the AI enhancement service.
optional-destination-path-where-the-enha: Optional destination path where the enhanced image will be saved. If not specified, the system will choose an appropriate location automatically.
the-local-file-path-where-the-ai-enhance: The local file path where the AI-enhanced image has been successfully saved. This path points to the downloaded result with improved clarity and resolution.
enhances-image-quality-and-clarity-from-: Enhances image quality and clarity from a remote URL using AI-powered super-resolution. This subflow submits an image URL to the enhancement service, polls for completion, and returns the URL of the enhanced result. Ideal for improving resolution and visual quality of images hosted on remote servers without downloading them first.
the-publicly-accessible-http-https-url-o: The publicly accessible HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image to enhance. The image will be processed remotely by the enhancement service.
the-url-of-the-ai-enhanced-image-with-im: The URL of the AI-enhanced image with improved clarity and resolution. This URL becomes available once the enhancement process completes successfully.
this-module-enhances-image-clarity-using: This module enhances image clarity using AI-powered super resolution technology. It takes a blurry or low-resolution image URL and returns a high-quality enhanced version.
url-of-the-image-to-enhance2: URL of the image to enhance
session-id-for-polling-the-enhancement-r: Session ID for polling the enhancement result
whether-the-request-was-submitted-succes: Whether the request was submitted successfully
query-the-status-and-result-of-an-image-: Query the status and result of an image enhancement conversion task from fal-aura-sr API with optional polling support
task-id-returned-from-the-conversion-req: Task ID returned from the conversion request
enable-automatic-polling-until-task-comp: Enable automatic polling until task completes (default: true)
interval-between-polling-attempts-in-sec: Interval between polling attempts in seconds (default: 5)
url-of-the-enhanced-image-available-when: URL of the enhanced image (available when status is completed)
complete-result-data-from-the-api2: Complete result data from the API
boolean-indicating-if-the-task-is-comple: Boolean indicating if the task is completed
enhances-image-quality-and-clarity-from-: Enhances image quality and clarity from a remote URL using AI-powered super-resolution. This subflow submits an image URL to the enhancement service, polls for completion, and returns the URL of the enhanced result. Ideal for improving resolution and visual quality of images hosted on remote servers without downloading them first.
the-publicly-accessible-http-https-url-o: The publicly accessible HTTP/HTTPS URL of the image to enhance. The image will be processed remotely by the enhancement service.
the-url-of-the-ai-enhanced-image-with-im: The URL of the AI-enhanced image with improved clarity and resolution. This URL becomes available once the enhancement process completes successfully.
